name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Candy Crush For PC,Windows and Mac (100% Safe Download)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy the sweetest browsing experience with Candy Crush Fun!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy Candy Crush on PC, Windows, and Mac with our extension! Start new games, get move guidance, and track scores easily. 


✅ Candy Crush Extension Features:

✔️ New Game: You will start a new game by selecting "New Game." Your score will be displayed at the top.

✔️ Show Move: Here, you will be provided with guidelines on where to make Candy Moves and whether it's beneficial.

✔️ Easy to use

✔️ Simple Extension

✅ How To Use Candy Crush on PC?

Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: You will see three tabs:
"Candy Crush Score"
"New Game"
"Show Move"

Step 4: In the top you can see Score Then First tab, you can Start New Game,  In the second tab you can see Candy Move Guide lines. Then you can play Easily.

Step 5: Enjoy Candy Crush game Easily!

✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that "Candy Crush for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Candy Crush Android Game or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the Candy Crush Android Game.
